creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription:
Takamura's poem:
(Please tell my friends
That I sailed in the Ocean
Heading a number of islands
If you are asked, Fishermen on the boats)
{Wata no hara
Yaso-jima kakete 
Kogi ide nu
Hito ni wa tsuge yo
Ama no Tsuribune}
followed by a detailed explantion of the poem
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
portfolio: Illustrations of the Hundred Poems by the Hundred Poets (Hyakunin isshu no uchi)
title: Illustration of of the Sangi Kōmura's Poem
